#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1005;
int t,n,k,dp[N][N],i,j,A[N];
int main() {
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while( t-- )
	{
	    memset(dp , 0 ,sizeof(dp));
	    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	    for(i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
	     scanf("%d",&A[i]);
	    for( i = 0 ; i <= n  ; i++)
	      dp[0][i] = 1;
	    for( i = 1 ; i <= k ; i++ )
	      for( j = 1 ; j <= n ; j++ )
	        {
	            dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1] ;
	            if(i >= A[j-1]  )
	              dp[i][j] = dp[i][j] || dp[i- A[j-1]][j-1];
	        }
	   if(dp[k][n])
	   printf("1\n");
	   else
	   printf("0\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
